Given a version number MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH, increment the version:

    MAJOR version when you make incompatible API changes
    MINOR version when you add functionality in a backwards compatible manner
    PATCH version when you make backwards compatible bug fixes

Based on the following commit messages and the latest version $latest_version
determine the next version using semantic versioning following the rules above.

THE COMMITS MESSSAGES:
```
$commit_messages
```

Remember to write only the next version number, e.g. 1.2.3
THE NEXT VERSION:
